IRPF_MCP.description: MCP server for Brazilian tax return (IRPF) assistance

tax_return_2025://2025.description: Reads the current tax return XML file from the Receita Federal IRPF-2025 program
tax_return_2025://2025.returns: JSON representation of the tax return

query_irpf_db.description: Execute a SQL query against the IRPF DuckDB database

returns.description: Result of the query as a pandas DataFrame

find_salary_income.description: Find all salary income records in the database

returns.description: Salary income records as a pandas DataFrame
Total payments grouped by category as a pandas DataFrame
Asset analysis results as a pandas DataFrame

all_income_sources.description: Find all income sources across different categories

returns.description: All income sources as a pandas DataFrame

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query to search in the knowledge base

XML_TAX_RETURN.description: Tools that work with the XML tax return file from the Receita Federal IRPF-2025 program
XML_TAX_RETURN.source: XML file in the tax software

DATABASE.description: Tools that query the DuckDB database containing information extracted from various financial documents (employers, banks, etc.)
DATABASE.source: Parsed PDF documents in meus_arquivos folder

KNOWLEDGE_BASE.description: Tools that access the vector database containing tax information from the Brazilian tax authority
KNOWLEDGE_BASE.source: Vector database built from tax authority documentation

metadata.author: IRPF MCP Team
metadata.notes: While this configuration is in English, all LLM outputs and knowledge base responses will be in Portuguese (pt-BR)
